blocks.name: fgraphopab
blocks.content: Express a function as a subset of the Cartesian product. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fgraphopab(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(c0, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  syl6eq(c0, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), cin(cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cxp(c1, c2)), wf(c0, c1, c2))
  eqtr3d(c0, cin(cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cxp(c1, c2)), cin(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wf(c0, c1, c2))
  sylib(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), c0), wss(c0, cxp(c1, c2)))
  fssxp(c0, c1, c2)
  df-ss(c0, cxp(c1, c2))
  ineq1d(c0, cxp(c1, c2), cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wf(c0, c1, c2))
  sylib(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wfn(c0, c1))
  ffn(c0, c1, c2)
  dffn5(s0, c0, c1)
  3eqtri(cin(cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cxp(c1, c2)), copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), cin(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))), copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))))
  ineq12i(cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cxp(c1, c2), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))
  df-mpt(s0, s1, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  df-xp(s0, s1, c1, c2)
  inopab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))
  opabbii(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))
  bitr3i(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wa(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))
  anandi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), c2))
  3bitr2i(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wa(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wa(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  ancom(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), c2))
  anass(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  anbi2i(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))
  eqcom(cv(s1), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: fgraphxp
blocks.content: Express a function as a subset of the Cartesian product. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fgraphxp(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(c0, crab(s0, cxp(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl6eqr(c0, crab(s0, cxp(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))), wf(c0, c1, c2))
  fgraphopab(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2)
  eqtri(crab(s0, cxp(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))), copab(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))))
  rabxp(s0, hs0, hs1, c1, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))
  eqeq12d(cfv(c0, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1), wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  fveq2d(c0, cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), cv(hs0), wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  op1std(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  op2ndd(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  opabbii(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))
  df-3an(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fgraphxp(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 : c1 → c2)→ c0 = { s0 ∈(c1 × c2)|(c0 `(1st ` s0))=(2nd ` s0)})
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl6eqr(c0, { s0 ∈(c1 × c2)|(c0 `(1st ` s0))=(2nd ` s0)}, { < hs0, hs1 > |((hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2)∧(c0 ` hs0)= hs1)}, (c0 : c1 → c2))
  fgraphopab(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2)
  eqtri({ s0 ∈(c1 × c2)|(c0 `(1st ` s0))=(2nd ` s0)}, { < hs0, hs1 > |((hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2)∧(c0 ` hs0)= hs1)}, { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2 ∧(c0 ` hs0)= hs1)})
  rabxp(s0, hs0, hs1, c1, c2, (c0 `(1st ` s0))=(2nd ` s0), (c0 ` hs0)= hs1)
  eqeq12d((c0 `(1st ` s0)), (2nd ` s0), (c0 ` hs0), hs1, s0 = < hs0, hs1 >)
  fveq2d(c0, (1st ` s0), hs0, s0 = < hs0, hs1 >)
  op1std(s0, hs0, hs1)
  op2ndd(s0, hs0, hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  opabbii(hs0, hs1, (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2 ∧(c0 ` hs0)= hs1), ((hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2)∧(c0 ` hs0)= hs1))
  df-3an(hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c2, (c0 ` hs0)= hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, (c0 ` hs0), hs1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 `(1st ` s0))=(2nd ` s0))
  diff.hs1.w((c0 `(1st ` s0))=(2nd ` s0))
}

blocks.name: hausgraph
blocks.content: The graph of a continuous function into a Hausdorff space is closed. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm hausgraph(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, co(c2, ctx, c0))))
} = {
  eqeltrd(c1, cfv(ccld, co(c2, ctx, c0)), cdm(cin(ccom(c1, cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)))), cres(c2nd, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))))), wa(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c0))))
  3eqtr4rd(c1, cdm(cin(ccom(c1, cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)))), cres(c2nd, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))))), crab(hs0, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)), wceq(cfv(ccom(c1, cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)))), cv(hs0)), cfv(cres(c2nd, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), cv(hs0)))), crab(hs0, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)), wceq(cfv(c1, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)))), wa(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c0))))
  rabbidva(hs0, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c0))), wceq(cfv(ccom(c1, cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)))), cv(hs0)), cfv(cres(c2nd, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c1, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))))
  eqeq12d(cfv(ccom(c1, cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)))), cv(hs0)), cfv(cres(c2nd, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)))))
  eqtrd(cfv(ccom(c1, cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)))), cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))), cfv(c1, cfv(cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), cv(hs0))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)))))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), wceq(cfv(ccom(c1, cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)))), cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cfv(cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), cv(hs0)))))
  mpan(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), wceq(cfv(ccom(c1, cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)))), cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cfv(cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), cv(hs0)))), wfn(cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))))
  ax-mp(wfn(cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), wf(cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)), cuni(c2)))
  ffn(cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)), cuni(c2))
  fvco2(cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)), cv(hs0), c1)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), wceq(cfv(c1, cfv(cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), cv(hs0))), cfv(c1, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)))))
  fveq2d(c1, cfv(cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), cv(hs0)), cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))))
  fvres(cv(hs0), cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)), c1st)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), wceq(cfv(cres(c2nd, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), cv(hs0)), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))))
  fvres(cv(hs0), cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)), c2nd)
  sylancl(wa(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c0))), wceq(cdm(cin(ccom(c1, cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)))), cres(c2nd, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))))), crab(hs0, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)), wceq(cfv(ccom(c1, cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)))), cv(hs0)), cfv(cres(c2nd, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), cv(hs0))))), wfn(ccom(c1, cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)))), cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), wfn(cres(c2nd, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))))
  ffnd(ccom(c1, cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)))), cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)), cuni(c0), wa(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c0))))
  sylancl(wa(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c0))), wf(ccom(c1, cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)))), cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)), cuni(c0)), wf(c1, cuni(c2), cuni(c0)), wf(cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)), cuni(c2)))
  f1stres(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))
  fco(c1, cuni(c2), cuni(c0), cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)))
  ax-mp(wfn(cres(c2nd, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), wf(cres(c2nd, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)), cuni(c0)))
  f2ndres(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))
  ffn(cres(c2nd, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)), cuni(c0))
  fndmin(hs0, ccom(c1, cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)))), cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)), cres(c2nd, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c0))), wceq(c1, crab(hs0, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)), wceq(cfv(c1, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))))), wf(c1, cuni(c2), cuni(c0)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c0)), wf(c1, cuni(c2), cuni(c0)))
  cnf(c1, c2, c0, cuni(c2), cuni(c0))
  fgraphxp(hs0, c1, cuni(c2), cuni(c0))
  hauseqlcld(ccom(c1, cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)))), cres(c2nd, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), co(c2, ctx, c0), c0, wa(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c0))))
  sylancom(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c0)), wcel(ccom(c1, cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)))), co(co(c2, ctx, c0), ccn, c0)), wcel(cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), co(co(c2, ctx, c0), ccn, c2)))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c0))), wcel(cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), co(co(c2, ctx, c0), ccn, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c2))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))))
  tx1cn(c2, cuni(c2), c0, cuni(c0))
  cnco(cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), co(c2, ctx, c0), c2, c1, c0)
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c0))), wcel(cres(c2nd, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), co(co(c2, ctx, c0), ccn, c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c2))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c0))), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c2))), wcel(c2, ctop))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c0)), wcel(c2, ctop))
  cntop1(c1, c2, c0)
  toptopon(c2, cuni(c2))
  eqid(cuni(c2))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c0))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c0))), wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c0, cha))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c0)))
  haustop(c0)
  toptopon(c0, cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  tx2cn(c2, cuni(c2), c0, cuni(c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c0))))
  diff.hs0.c(ccom(c1, cres(c1st, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)))))
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(cres(c2nd, cxp(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c2))
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c0))
}

blocks.name: df-topsep
blocks.content: A topology is _separable_ iff it has a countable dense subset. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Jan-2015.)

blocks.name: df-toplnd
blocks.content: A topology is _Lindelöf_ iff every open cover has a countable subcover. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Jan-2015.)
